title: #1【ユニコーン】『機動戦士ガンダムUC RE:0096』同時視聴！！ぺこ！【ホロライブ/兎田ぺこら】
name: Usada Pekora

entries.text: Honestly, regarding the true identity and stuff...
Apparently, you can enjoy it without watching the rest.
And checking out other works later might be good too.
I decided to take the plunge this time.
Well, if I get super hooked, let's watch the rest eventually.
I was planning to watch Gyandam...
So I didn't really have any stream prep to do...
I had a recording around noon, came back home...
That was my first meal of the day when I got back, so...
If I get hooked, Pekora can keep it up.
After that, I did some stuff, thought I had time before the stream, and set a loud alarm.
And I was asleep until just a moment ago.
It was close. For a second, I was still sleepy.
I thought 'just a bit more' and kept hitting snooze without looking at the time.
Ah, shut up, shut up, shut up.
Then with my eyes closed, I thought...
Wait, has the alarm stopped ringing?
Or maybe I was tired, I don't know peko, but...
It's honestly the fault of how easy it is to sleep.
I want to do a poem too.
Woah, what should I do for the poem...
I'm counting on you for context.
It really helps when you guys give me little bits of context.
"I want to ride a Gundam too."
There isn't one, so are you sure? Really?
If that happens, tell me properly.
"Ah, this guy doesn't get the meaning right now."
"Can't be helped! We'll teach you!" When that happens...
Don't be annoying in the comments.
Umm, I wrote this in the description too, but...
For those watching on AmaPri [Amazon Prime]...
The first logo appears at 8 seconds.
I think we can sync up like that kamo.
I'll say this just in case.
Limited to those watching on AmaPri.
You might need to download it beforehand...
Or watch it first, otherwise it might be tricky.
When people wanted to watch Kaguya-hime together...
There's a chance you get the ad-free version.
If you watch on Netflix with Pekora...
I want you to tell me one thing first.
How many episodes are we watching today?
And this is Mobile Suit Gundam...
If you're watching that, skip to there.
Ah, there's a Gundam 00, isn't there?
That one's famous too. Never seen it though.
Everyone, Pekora will start watching now.
Press play on the 'Go' of '3, 2, 1, Go'.
If you've had the page open, refresh it once.
It might buffer for a second before starting.
So press play once to see if it starts immediately.
I was focusing so hard on the anime...
I completely forgot about the timer.
For those at 0 or the logo...
I was seriously focused, totally zoned in.
Because the protagonist just popped up!
Right, I had to press the timer too.
So that's why it's RE... got it.
He protected his son, right? This part?
The BGM I hear a lot.
Crap, why is it so intense right from the start?
I thought it would be that.
It feels like he let him escape, but...
Why did it turn out like this?
Didn't he want to do something...
I don't know. You can't tell just by the voice.
I didn't think it was God at all.
The world ends, a new world...
They made a country in space?
So is this guy like the president?
He looked too adult to be the protagonist.
I thought he was the MC from the side profile...
It's not like they can't live on Earth anymore, right?
We have to join hands together.
What do you mean Hathaway is the protagonist?
Was it too early for humanity?
Woah, if the lifeline thing is cut...
This kid is done for. This person.
He was thrown out alone into that space?
How did he survive, this guy?
Something sparkling in a ring on his head.
What is he planning to do?
That one just now definitely looks like a bad guy.
That guy is an enemy, surely.
Wait, maybe this person isn't bad.
Ah, it's because there's something on the ship.
Is it because that girl is there?
Did she fly funnels just now?
When you look closely, it's scary.
There are people inside these, right?
With something like a beam sword...
But yeah, unmanned is probably impossible.
Are there people who came to space despite that?
That's a bit of an evil smile.
Eh, Pekora, if that kind of...
Then you can go pyun and fly up.
Zero gravity? So he's doing this with one hand?
Ah, it's light because of zero gravity.
Eh, cute. He has a Haro.
This kid looks at fine details.
Ah, it really was flying! It wasn't a hallucination?
W-what's wrong, what's wrong with this person?
Two people ride? Gundams aren't single-seaters?
Ah, are they not handling the G-force well?
This old man, Banagher's papa... He doesn't drive? Anaheim.
Are they not supposed to be seen? Not supposed to be seen, right?
See, well, someone saw it. Banagher-kun did.
Oh, it's a secret. The Sleeves... Laplace Cube?
Eh? Ah, was it his son? Father.
What did he want to do more? Unicorn.
Eh, wait, when does that sad event happen? The father part is scary.
What was that? They keep saying Laplace, Laplace.
He definitely has an evil face, this old man. Clearly a villain face.
I saw the beginning so I know. This face... He let them in, but doesn't seem to be caught.
Hey, only this kid felt the wind. Is the clock on Space Time? Can ordinary people just enter like this?
Suuu... Waah, she fell! Why can Banagher sense it?
Isn't Banagher's eyesight too good? Did he see her now? The old guy too.
Isn't Banagher weird? Even with good eyes, you can't see that.
Also, do they just get thrown out like that?
I'll say it as many times as needed.
This place feels like Earth, it's nice.
Oi, who and who... Who and who are planning to war?
Fun... eh, wait, it's already over.
Felt like 5 seconds. Felt like 5 seconds.
Eh, eh, wait, Ep 1 is over?
Eh, isn't that fast? Too fast?
Eh, it ended in a second, I'm shocked.
I thought we'd see the "Father! Father!" part.
"Alright, let's live in space from now on!"
Something like an explosion accident happened.
Was lying in a fancy bed.
Maybe a relative of his dad? I don't know.
Like it could end the world.
And they're trying to do that.
And the girl came to talk about stopping it or not, maybe?
Manage the start. Otherwise, with the song and stuff, from the beginning...
Logo. Probably Sunrise logo. From 8 seconds.
Mobile Suit Gundam Unicorn RE:0096 Episode 2.
That guy wasn't a bad guy?
I thought she was being kidnapped, this woman.
So if it's the two of them...
I totally thought it was that.
A man who can't give up.
Because he had a "I'm a villain" face.
Eh, but let's stop the war.
That small guy said it too.
But why are they trying to do it?
Why do they have to do it?
I still don't get it at all.
She feels like a losing heroine.
Right, she's the one from earlier.
So these people didn't know either, huh.
They have hot dogs in space.
Eh, if you can eat the same food as Earth normally...
At Costco, it's 180 yen and comes with a drink.
Is it from an older era or something?
He won't make it self-destruct, right?
Did he do combat training or something?
Eh, cute. I want a Haro.
Eh, I want one at home.
I want it to say "Pekora danger, Pekora danger".
Wait, oh no. Don't look at the losing heroine girl.
No, true. The distance is bugged.
The question is can you stop the war.
White is nice. White is nice.
Banagher-kun said he has nowhere to go home to.
Meaning he doesn't want it opened?
Why did they decide to hand it over?
If he's the dad, isn't he pretty old?
Ah, but there's the feeling of not wanting to involve him.
Even though he's cool and all...
He says he has nowhere to go home to...
He still has that cuteness left.
Char's box has a key, and if opened it's bad?
But then why give Laplace's Box...
Thanks to Laplace's Box, there's prosperity...
Why the need to easily let it go?
Leaving the painting to someone else.
I feel like there's definitely something.
If it's dangerous, you don't want to draw them in.
Oi, what to do, you okay?
This guy looks like he'll get beaten.
If the mobile suit gets hit...
I thought if nerves were connected it'd be bad.
Wait, too much info, can't organize it. Too difficult.
But I get that Laplace's Box is crazy.
Banagher's papa's group has been prospering thanks to Laplace's Box...
So they're entrusting the box of wishes to these scary old men...
And just as they said "be careful"...
I don't need to understand perfectly now.
You like space, so space is fine.
Isn't it that kind of talk?
Is it a more difficult story?
Why do they need to be on bad terms?
No, "You like Earth, so go ahead."
"You like space, so space is fine."
Were forced to be sent to space?
With Laplace's Box, they might go "bam" and flip it?
Wait, prep the stopwatch or I'll miss it.
Eh, so Earth is more important.
Pekora assumed Space was just naturally better.
Totally, I mean, isn't this amazing?
Well, true, if you can live on Earth...
Why live in Space? I guess.
Doesn't look inconvenient at all though.
True, it looks rougher than Earth.
He said "I'm handing over just the key".
So in the end, they don't want to change things?
But then the Earth people would be pitiful?
Since I don't know Gundam at all...
Is there justice on both sides?
Eh, who should Pekora root for?
Eh, how should I feel watching this?
I don't have feelings for the Earth side right now.
Hmm, should I root from Banagher's POV?
Okay okay, I'm getting it. Thanks.
That Unicorn... isn't it unseen by the Earth side?
That Unicorn is like a secret weapon.
Isn't it passing as a secret weapon for the Space side?
Eh, isn't this bad? Space side is done for.
Wait, isn't Space side disadvantaged in war?
Even if they run, there's no way to survive in space, is there?
